title: Re-Installing league
body:
So I had a 2months break from league and just came back to download the game again. But whenever I try to install it just closes at a random point, normally around 30+% with no error messages what so ever. If you need more info please tell me
And league worked perfectly fine on pc before I took the pause

replies.body: It's really strange that your patcher is just closing like that without an error.  To start, let's make sure that your OS and anti-virus settings aren't blocking league from prepping and installing your game files.  Run through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that League is being added as an exception.  Then give it another go, and let me know if everything's okay!
